Employee.name: Robert
Employee.curriculumVitae:
Robert Marsh

An excellent developer he is working in UBM for only 1 year but he
has a 10 years experience as a developer and 5 years as a designer.

Since he is new he is only taking jobs under new project managers. He
knows only how the promasi OS works. We wouldn't recommend him for testing
purposes, he is only putting effort on interesting things.

Employee.name: Samuel
Employee.curriculumVitae:
Samuel Garcia

He is working for UBM for a year, his skills as a coder are low
but he has a really good experience in testing. He worked as a tester
for 6 years.

Since he is new he is only working with new project managers,
he knows how promasi OS works and has tested it many times. He hasn't any knowledge
in our other products though.

Employee.name: James
Employee.curriculumVitae:
James Rowland

He is working for UBM for 10 years, his skills as a coder are really low
he has only experience with scripting languages,
but he has a really good experience in testing.He worked as a tester
for 6 years before UBM.

He basically knows how to test almost every product in your department.
